name: Lofty Tower's Flaming Brazier
description: The standard chandelier of a lofty tower, consisting of a massive circular brazier adorned with various metallic decorations. When lit, the roaring flames are set off by the solemn grandeur of its overall design, invigorating and inspiring the beholder.\nIt must be noted, however, that open flames in enclosed spaces can present a serious fire hazard. You must therefore always ensure proper ventilation when lighting up this chandelier, and keep a close eye on the flames to prevent any accidents.
